title: KRÜGSPEED Lotus - How 'Fast' Happens Part 2 - /SHAKEDOWN
description:
It's time for Leo Parente to drive the supercharged KRÜGSPEED Lotus Exige race car at Lime Rock Park. 

Alex Krugman and his team were there to shakedown his 2 Lotus in advance of their trip to the SCCA National Runoffs. So, Leo had to drive smart and be respectful of the team's bigger priorities vs /ShakeDown getting some video footage. No curb-hopping or power drifts. But, that doesn't mean the Lotus didn't go quick enough to pass a few cars. Even with a lower than max redline as a new motor was being brought up to race condition.‎

After the run, Leo and the KRÜGSPEED racers - David Brand and Elivan Goulart share track notes on how to get around Lime Rock fast.
